name: 3D Fighter Jet Hurricane - Air Plane Combat Storm
name_original: 3D Fighter Jet Hurricane - Air Plane Combat Storm
description:
Climb into the cockpit of the worlds most advanced fighter aircraft and duke it out with the best of the best!

Do you want to air your pilot wings? Get flying immediately on important missions to destroy and defend the nation!

Realistic flying controls, 3 types of weaponry including missiles, guns and bombs!

DOWNLOAD AND FLY TODAY!
